metadata.title: CVE-2019-13735 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds write in JavaScript in Google Chrome prior to 79.0.3945.79allowed a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code inside a sandbox via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
